definition: value/(to be) worth/to happen to/to be on duty
magnitude of value/labor value (in economics, the labor inherent in a commodity)

sentences.english: Objective To investigate the value of ultrasound in the diagnosis of theca cell tumor.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討超聲檢查在卵泡膜細胞瘤診斷中的價值。

sentences.english: but he left it to him on such terms as destroyed half the value of the bequest .
sentences.chinese: 但是，因爲附有條件，這份遺產便失去了一半價值。

sentences.english: It delivers value more slowly to everyone. Invariably.
sentences.chinese: 這會讓交付價值變得更慢，對所有客戶都會變慢。

sentences.english: Chihiro has thus been recognized by everyone to achieve their value.
sentences.chinese: 千尋也因此獲得衆人的認可，實現了自己的價值。

sentences.english: Objective To study the clinical diagnosis of B-mode ultrasound to gynecologic acute abdomen.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討B型超聲對婦科急腹症的臨牀診斷價值。

sentences.english: Objective To make new approach of the interventional radiology in the treatment of ischemic necrosis of caput femoris in children.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討介入治療兒童股骨頭缺血性壞死的價值。

sentences.english: Non -stress test has a higher clinical value in foretelling perinatal prognosis ofp olyhydramnios.
sentences.chinese: 無激惹試驗在其預測圍生兒預後具有較好的臨牀價值。

sentences.english: Commodity money takes the form of a commodity with intrinsic value.
sentences.chinese: 貨幣本身即具備某種固有財貨的價值。

sentences.english: As it turns out, a handful of scientific studies show that chicken soup really could have medicinal value.
sentences.chinese: 而且幾項科學研究也表明，雞湯的確具有藥用價值。

sentences.english: in terms of our values and our democratic rights and whatever.
sentences.chinese: 就我們的價值觀和民主權力而言，諸如此類都是如此。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the clinical value of supraglottic horizontal partial laryngectomy.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討喉聲門上水平部分切除術的臨牀應用價值。

sentences.english: We do this because we believe in the dignity and value of every person.
sentences.chinese: 我們這樣做是因爲我們相信每個人的尊嚴和價值。

sentences.english: It is possible to make qualitative distinctions of worth.
sentences.chinese: 是能對價值進行定性區分的。

sentences.english: China Adult Constitute Standard Guide has certain applicative value.
sentences.chinese: 《中國成年人體質測定標準指南》具有應用價值。

sentences.english: Objective To evaluate the value of high frequency ultrasound in diagnosis of trauma of tendo calcaneus.
sentences.chinese: 目的探討高頻超聲對跟腱損傷的診斷價值。

sentences.english: It has high value in the comprehensive experiments of electronic circuits.
sentences.chinese: 在電子電路綜合型實驗中，有較高的應用價值。

definition: to create/to bring about/to produce/to set (a record)
regarding/as far as sth is concerned/with regards to
not only (this one)/not just (...) but also
immediately/at once/at that moment/at the moment
character/intrinsic quality (of a person)/quality (of a product or service, or as in "quality of life", "air quality" etc)
one's conduct/deed/activity/accomplishment/achievement/to act as/as (in the capacity of)/qua/to view as/to look upon (sth as)/to take sth to be
